charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to 46 months on Count 1 of the Indictment; defendant is ordered to 3 years of supervised release on Count 1; See J&;C for Special Conditions of Release; fine is waived; defendant is assessed a Special Assessment Fee of $100.00 which is due immediately; defendant is allowed to surrender to the instutition on Monday, May 26, 2003 before 2:00 p.m.

charges.charge_description: did knowingly possess, in and affecting commerce, approximately 17 firearms, including a Beretta 12-gauge, semi-automatic shotgun, Model Number A303, Serial Number N05767E, and an American Arms Inc., 20-gauge over-under shotgun, Model Silver I, Serial Number X4656, which had been transported in interstate commerce [ 4:02-m -36 ]

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon order of Judge Maughmer as the grand jury has returned an indictment against this dft.
